mapper.insert: insert into user (ID, `TYPE`, `NAME`, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NUMBER, ID_NUMBER, `STATUS`, USER_LOGIN_ID, TENANT_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{userLoginId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update user set `TYPE` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, USER_LOGIN_ID = #{userLoginId,jdbcType=CHAR}, TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, `TYPE`, `NAME`, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NUMBER, ID_NUMBER, `STATUS`, USER_LOGIN_ID, TENANT_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID from user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, `TYPE`, `NAME`, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NUMBER, ID_NUMBER, `STATUS`, USER_LOGIN_ID, TENANT_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID from user
